pr_title: [NETBEANS-3693] Create only one instance of javac

timeline.message: [NETBEANS-3693] Create only one instance of javac

timeline.bodyText: I suspect this will disable "sequential" processing when nb-javac is installed, right? Or do I miss something here?
timeline.author: lahodaj

replies.bodyText: This is handled above on the if-else conditions starting at line 440. If nb-javac is installed then sequential parsing will not be null and remaining code will be same as of before this PR.
replies.author: Akshay-Gupta-Oracle

replies.bodyText: Is this OK @jlahoda, can this PR be merged now??
replies.author: Akshay-Gupta-Oracle

replies.bodyText: I note that the if on line 448 is also checking oneInstanceJava. So it seems to me that is sequentialParsing != null and oneInstanceJava == false, the it will always fall to the else section and go file-by-file. Or what do I miss?
replies.author: lahodaj

replies.bodyText:
You're correct @jlahoda I've removed the oninstance variable form second if. and added (sequentialParsing != null || oneInstanceJava) instead.
Now this PR is final
replies.author: Akshay-Gupta-Oracle
